Navigated to the "Byte Blaze / dotfiles" repository to access project settings for inviting Vinta as a guest.
```click("901")```

Clicked the Settings link to access project settings for member management.
```click("395")```

Clicked the Members link to navigate to the Members section for adding guests.
```click("407")```

Searched for Vinta in the member search box and set the role to Guest to enable the "Add to project" button for inviting Vinta as a guest.
```fill("490", "Vinta")```

Selected "Vinta Chen @vinta" from the search results to proceed with the invitation.
```keyboard_press("Enter")```

Clicked the "Add to project" button to invite the selected user "Vinta Chen @vinta" to the project.
```click("512")```

Successfully invited Vinta Chen as a guest to the project.
```send_msg_to_user("Vinta has been successfully invited to the dotfiles repository as a guest. He can now check your dotfile configurations.")```
